com: that's the first breakthrough, Rahane edged one to cover! Incoming delivery towards the stumps and Rahane closed the face of the bat early, the ball ballooned off the edge to cover for an easy peasy catch
how: c Sikandar Raza b Chibhabha 63 (101m 83b 7x4 0x6) SR: 75.90

com: nearly dropped near the boundary, but taken! Vijay lofted the ball very high as it came in, he didn't swing the bat all the way and Waller came under it early, got into position and caught it only after the ball popped out of his hands once.Vijay is very disappointed with himself
how: c sub (MN Waller) b Madziva 72 (135m 95b 1x4 2x6) SR: 75.78

com: tries to go for a six on the leg side and he's taken! He came down, heaved the length delivery from leg stump but Waller took a comfortable catch at deep midwicket, a few yards inside the boundary
how: c sub (MN Waller) b Sikandar Raza 41 (71m 50b 3x4 0x6) SR: 82.00

com: Tiwary goes as well, straightforward catch to short fine leg! Tiwary shuffled towards off with a step down and flicked the ball late on leg, but straight to Vitori

what a yorker, the crowd erupts, Madziva is running around! Uthappa looked to play it off the front foot as the ball came in sharply and knocked the off stump over. Sent it for a walk actually. Umpires check for a no ball and it's fine
full toss, Binny smashes it down the ground but doesn't get enough and Raza takes an impressive catch at long on while diving forward
how: c Sikandar Raza b Vitori 25 (32m 16b 3x4 0x6) SR: 156.25

com: Madziva has his third wicket, top edge from Jadhav after he came to the off side for a wild slog, and the ball went high just behind the stumps on the off side. Enough time for the keeper to come under it
number four for Madziva as another one holes out! He took the pace off the ball and pitched it on length, Axar heaved, sent it very high and Raza took another easy catch
how: c Sikandar Raza b Madziva 1 (2m 2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00
